children.text: recalls how he once trained cadets to go above and beyond the call of duty, by setting aviation standards impossibly high, and then instructing them to meet them
, even when no one was watching.
Raise the bar. Then keep it that way.
That seems to be an incredibly straightforward way to attain a higher level of excellence and a deeper sense of fulfillment in almost anything you could hope to aspire to.
